entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
